titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require drug manufacturers to provide rebates for drugs furnished under Medicare part B for which the growth in average sales price has exceeded inflation, and for other purposes.
Stop Drug Companies from Overcharging Seniors in Medicare Part B Act of 2019
Stop Drug Companies from Overcharging Seniors in Medicare Part B Act of 2019
Stop Drug Companies from Overcharging Seniors in Medicare Part B Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
